content: “According to a Kaiser Family Foundation poll released this month, 61 percent of the public say President Trump and Republicans in Congress are to blame for future problems with the ACA” Never mind that it was doomed to fail: marketplace premiums had already shot through the roof — for the few insurers who were still participating — while 44 was still in office. When it runs its natural course, it’ll be the GOP’s fault because they failed to repeal it...? LOL!
